rules.name: myRule_10
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND (4 OR 5 ) AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.label: ReOpen Case

rules.name: myRule_10_pmetrule
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND (4 OR 5 ) AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.label: Previously Met - Prev

Flow.description: SSC Advising Case Process | Case Reopen (filter criteria)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1_pmetrule
formulas.expression:
AND( OR ( {!myVariable_old.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'UG', {!myVariable_old.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'GL', {!myVariable_old.Service_Program_Code__c} = 'CT'),
OR( TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Enrolled-Active', TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ) = 'Open'),
ISBLANK( {!myVariable_old.Advising_Case_Number__c} ), !ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.Academic_Advisor__c} ) )

value.stringValue: IF( CASE(TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ), "Withdrawn Accounting",1, "Withdrawn FACTS",1, "Withdrawn No SSAF Student type",1, "Withdrawn Nurs Fail",1, "Withdrawn Payment Plan Failure",1, "Suspended",1, 0) > 0, TRUE, FALSE)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_6
formulas.expression: IF( CASE(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Status__c} ), "Withdrawn Accounting",1, "Withdrawn FACTS",1, "Withdrawn No SSAF Student type",1, "Withdrawn Nurs Fail",1, "Withdrawn Payment Plan Failure",1, "Suspended",1, 0) > 0, TRUE, FALSE)

value.stringValue: IF( CASE(TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ), "Withdrawn Accounting",1, "Withdrawn FACTS",1, "Withdrawn No SSAF Student type",1, "Withdrawn Nurs Fail",1, "Withdrawn Payment Plan Failure",1, "Suspended",1, 0) > 0, TRUE, FALSE)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_6_pmetrule
formulas.expression: IF( CASE(TEXT({!myVariable_old.Student_Status__c} ), "Withdrawn Accounting",1, "Withdrawn FACTS",1, "Withdrawn No SSAF Student type",1, "Withdrawn Nurs Fail",1, "Withdrawn Payment Plan Failure",1, "Suspended",1, 0) > 0, TRUE, FALSE)

value.stringValue: IF( CASE(TEXT([Degree_Program__c].Student_Status__c ), "Graduate",1, "ADM Withdrawn Correction",1, "ADM Withdrawn Transfer",1, "Withdrawn Correction",1, "Withdrawn Transfer",1, "Certificate Complete",1, "Certificate Withdrawn",1, "Commit to Enroll Expired",1, "Enrollment Declined",1, "Withdrawn Academic Probation",1, "Withdrawn AW grade limit",1, "Withdrawn Bad Ck",1, "Withdrawn Bursar Request",1, "Withdrawn Commit to Enroll",1, "Withdrawn Credit Accumulation",1, "Withdrawn Deceased",1, "Withdrawn Dismissed",1, "Withdrawn Enrollment",1, "Withdrawn Inappropriate Degree",1, "Withdrawn Limit Reached",1, "Withdrawn Package Pricing",1, "Withdrawn Studnt Req",1, "Withdrawn time limit",1, "Withdrawn-Concurrent Nursing Enrollment",1, "Withdrawn-Degree Revoked",1, 0) > 0, TRUE, FALSE)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_8
formulas.expression: IF( CASE(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Student_Status__c} ), "Graduate",1, "ADM Withdrawn Correction",1, "ADM Withdrawn Transfer",1, "Withdrawn Correction",1, "Withdrawn Transfer",1, "Certificate Complete",1, "Certificate Withdrawn",1, "Commit to Enroll Expired",1, "Enrollment Declined",1, "Withdrawn Academic Probation",1, "Withdrawn AW grade limit",1, "Withdrawn Bad Ck",1, "Withdrawn Bursar Request",1, "Withdrawn Commit to Enroll",1, "Withdrawn Credit Accumulation",1, "Withdrawn Deceased",1, "Withdrawn Dismissed",1, "Withdrawn Enrollment",1, "Withdrawn Inappropriate Degree",1, "Withdrawn Limit Reached",1, "Withdrawn Package Pricing",1, "Withdrawn Studnt Req",1, "Withdrawn time limit",1, "Withdrawn-Concurrent Nursing Enrollment",1, "Withdrawn-Degree Revoked",1, 0) > 0, TRUE, FALSE)

Flow.label: SSC_DegreeProgram_Case_Process
